snippet: A new initiative by Comptroller Scott Stringer aims to save New York City money and solve problems the way CompStat has helped the N.Y.P.D. reduce crime.
abstract: Editorial welcomes new initiative by New York City Comptroller Scott Stringer known as ClaimStat, which will use copious amounts of data about lawsuits and claims filed each year against city to save money and solve problems; expresses hope that initiative will operate in similar way to CompStat, which has helped New York Police Department reduce crime.
lead_paragraph: A new initiative by Comptroller Scott Stringer aims to save New York City money and solve problems the way CompStat has helped the N.Y.P.D. reduce crime.
